Package ohos.agp.components

Class RecycleItemProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.BaseItemProvider
      • ohos.agp.components.RecycleItemProvider
  • Deprecated. 
    Use BaseItemProvider instead

    @Deprecated
public abstract class RecycleItemProvider
extends BaseItemProvider
    Provides a RecycleItemProvider object to associate a ComponentProvider item with fundamental data of a Component.

    A recycler adapter extends BaseItemProvider. It can be used by each Component item in the dataset to release memory resources.

    Since:
    3

        @Deprecated
public void onItemMoved​(int from,
                        int to)
        Deprecated. Not used anymore. Use onItemMoved in BaseItemProvider instead.
        Called when a component item is moved to dataset.
        Overrides:
        onItemMoved in class BaseItemProvider
        Parameters:
        from - Indicates the original position of the Component item in the dataset.
        to - Indicates the latest position of the Component item in the dataset.
